tlc.title: Workers Compensation Act
tlc.titlechange: [revised as Workers Compensation Act - RSBC2019, c. 1]
tlc.subtitle: [for consumer price index adjustments, see the next table under Workers Compensation Act]

cbr.cbrtext: Sch B may be amended by WCB reg under RS1996-492-6(4.1)
Sch D may be amended by WCB reg under RS1996-492-7(3.1)
See entries under Workers Compensation Act - Consumer Price Index Adjustments

cifline.cifdate: 6 May 1999 [30 days after BC Reg 71/99 in Gazette 6 Apr 1999]
29 Mar 2000 [30 days after BC Reg 39/00 in Gazette 28 Feb 2000]
5 Sep 2000 [90 days after BC Reg 188/00 deposited 7 Jun 2000]

cbr.cbrtext: dollar amounts in Act [except ss. 33(4),(6),(8),(10)] must be adjusted by WCB reg on 1 Jan of each year, and Act is deemed amended, under RS1996-492-25.2(1),(2)
Act may be amended by reg, to reflect deemed amendments by WCB reg, under RS1996-492-224(2)(k)
